      • choosePlayer

        public Player choosePlayer(MetaPlayer player,
                           PlayerSelector selector,
                           boolean forceChoice)
                    throws UndoException
        Description copied from interface: EffectContext
        Asks the user associated with the actor to choose a player that responds to the given selector.
        Specified by:
        choosePlayer in interface EffectContext
        Parameters:
        player - A MetaPlayer object as mentioned in the card.
        selector - A PlayerSelector predicate that filters the selectable players.
        forceChoice - Whether the choice is mandatory or not.
        Returns:
        The player chosen by the user.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • choosePayment

        public PaymentReceipt choosePayment(PaymentInvoice price,
                                    int choice)
                             throws UndoException
        Description copied from interface: EffectContext
        Requests the user associated with the actor to pay for a given choice.
        Specified by:
        choosePayment in interface EffectContext
        Parameters:
        price - The price of the effect.
        choice - The ID of the effect the payment is for.
        Returns:
        A PaymentReceipt object containing the user's choice about the equip used to pay, or null if the payment was rejected.
        Throws:
        UndoException - if the user requested to undo the last action.

      • damageDealtTrigger

        public void damageDealtTrigger(Player attacker,
                               Player victim)
        Description copied from interface: EffectContext
        Notifies a damage dealt trigger to the context. The attacker has to be asked for additional power ups to be called.
        Specified by:
        damageDealtTrigger in interface EffectContext
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player whose attack triggered this event.
        victim - The player who took damage.

      • damageTakenTrigger

        public void damageTakenTrigger(Player attacker,
                               Player victim)
        Description copied from interface: EffectContext
        Notifies a damage taken trigger to the context. The victim has to be asked for power ups to be applied to the attacker
        Specified by:
        damageTakenTrigger in interface EffectContext
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player whose attack triggered this event.
        victim - The player who took damage.

        public void revertGameChange(GameChange gameChange)
        Description copied from interface: EffectContext

        Specified by:
